attributes.action: Keep Susan Isaacs Nursery, Bolton open
attributes.additional_details:
The nursery is being considered for closure as early as March 2016. 
Town hall and nursery bosses are blaming financial pressures and falling numbers. 

So please sign my petition to keep Susan Isaacs open for a second chance!
attributes.background:
A council-run nursery school, which has been educating children in Bolton since 1930's faces closure. 
The Susan Isaacs nursery, which looks after 63 children from birth to almost five years old, could shut it's doors with the loss of 22 jobs.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The issue is the responsibility of your local council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
